mapper.select: select contact_name, contact_key, contact_tel, contact_Email, province, contact_customer_key,contact_supplier_key, city, district, detail, contact_number from contact

select contact_name, contact_key, contact_tel, contact_Email, province, contact_customer_key,contact_supplier_key, city, district, detail, contact_number from contact where contact_key = #{contactKey}

select contact_name, contact_key, contact_tel, contact_Email, province, contact_supplier_key, city, district, detail, contact_number from contact
and contact_supplier_key = #{contactSupplierKey}

insert into contact(contact_name,contact_key, contact_tel, contact_Email, province, contact_customer_key,contact_supplier_key,city, district, detail, contact_number) values
(#{contactName},#{contactKey}, #{contactTel}, #{contactEmail}, #{province}, #{contactCustomerKey}, #{contactSupplierKey},#{city}, #{district}, #{detail}, #{contactNumber})

insert into contact(contact_name,contact_key, contact_tel, contact_Email, province, contact_customer_key,contact_supplier_key, city, district, detail, contact_number) values
(#{contactName},#{contactKey}, #{contactTel}, #{contactEmail}, #{province}, #{contactCustomerKey}, #{contactSupplierKey},#{city}, #{district}, #{detail}, #{contactNumber})
on duplicate key update contact_key = values(contact_key), contact_tel = values(contact_tel), contact_Email = values(contact_Email), province = values(province), contact_customer_key = values(contact_customer_key), contact_supplier_key = values(contact_supplier_key), city = values(city), district = values(district), detail = values(detail), contact_number = values(contact_number), contact_name = values(contact_name)
mapper.update:
update contact
contact_tel = #{contactTel},
contact_Email = #{contactEmail},
province = #{province},
contact_customer_key = #{contactCustomerKey},
contact_supplier_key = #{contactSupplierKey},
city = #{city},
district = #{district},
detail = #{detail},
contact_number = #{contactNumber},
contact_name = #{contactName},
where contact_key = #{contactKey}
mapper.select: select contact_name, contact_key, contact_tel, contact_Email, province, contact_customer_key, city, district, detail, contact_number from contact where contact_customer_key = #{contactCustomerKey}
